description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Twist your world, match 3 or more crystals to complete the 48 addicting levels. Collect the diamonds to dominate the game. Try the four different modes and face your friends with the multiplayer mode.
description.short: Twist your world, match 3 or more crystals to complete the 48 addicting levels. Collect the diamonds to dominate the game. Try the four different modes and face your friends with the multiplayer mode.
